664765629711450112.text: I have concluded the #VallettaSummit on migration. Political Declaration and Action Plan unanimously adopted

664520755674263552.text: My opening statement at the #VallettaSummit. #refugeecrisis https://t.co/MOCIl2TP87

664516990304956419.text: RT @EUCouncilTVNews: #VallettaSummit on #migration Leaders opening speeches: @eucopresident  https://t.co/I7ObRK4OdU

664499606630350848.text: Voluntary return always preferable. But when not possible, non-voluntary return is pre-requisite for well-managed migration policy

664499458042916864.text: Five: Return of those not entitled to international protection. To keep doors open for refugees & legal migrants.

664497984302903296.text: Four: Support displaced people in Africa & offer international protection to those entitled.

664497938626908162.text: Three: Prevent trafficking of migrants by criminal gangs whose only motive is profit.

664497510233333761.text:
One: Address root causes of migration.
Two: Legal migration to remain open. Mobility a driver of growth in both continents.

664497161388838913.text: #VallettaSummit to agree joint African-European approach & concrete steps in five areas:

664496785562411009.text: I have now opened #VallettaSummit to discuss migration. Number of people on the move has never been so big. Africa & Europe under pressure

664416407090831360.text: Bilateral meeting with President of Cape Verde ahead of #VallettaSummit starting today https://t.co/8jpBUCtR42

664406155809148928.text: Meeting Ethiopia's PM Hailemariam Desalegn ahead of today's #VallettaSummit https://t.co/W9oQfvtmJi

664145012557508608.text: Read my address to the Maltese Parliament on the eve of the #VallettaSummit https://t.co/h0dDDsqppa https://t.co/VprtTK712X

664136227063508992.text: The precondition for conducting our own European migration policy is restoring effective control over our external borders

664135149106409472.text: #VallettaSummit not to invent new political framework but to achieve concrete, operational actions on migration together in 2016

664134880943566849.text: EU & Africa face even tougher task than #RefugeeCrisis. Security & sustainable prosperity are shared birth-right of Africans & Europeans

664134641725648897.text: Facing #RefugeeCrisis will challenge and change EU as fundamentally as any treaty amendment, national election, or monetary crisis

664134409604435968.text: EU has saved thousands of people at sea, governments reviewing a million asylum applications, support to WFP & UNHCR. Still much more to do

664134263806259200.text: Malta @ crossroads of European history. Valletta ideal place for African & European leaders to begin managing migration together

664132983390121984.text: In a moment I have the honour of addressing a special session of the Maltese Parliament. Live at https://t.co/C22oGUG3BT #VallettaSummit

664037102456315904.text: Next week, I will launch bilateral consultations with Member States as well as EP on topics to be addressed in #UKinEU negotiations

664036839930597376.text: Acknowledgement of receipt. With @David_Cameron's letter, negotiations on #UKinEU can now begin

663861535077453824.text: My speech in Berlin tonight: https://t.co/Da7kjGZUmX #EuropaRede #BC2015 #Mauerfall

663795963602030592.text: Europe should show solidarity to Germany. And Germany must believe that it is co-responsible for whole political community of Europeans.

663795393801666560.text: European future will largely depend on Germany's approach to #RefugeeCrisis. Germany & Angela Merkel examples of best European tradition.

663794865168252928.text: Three: #RefugeeCrisis breeds fears. Biggest opportunity for radical populists since 1945. Our greatest task is to protect liberal democracy.

663793945403654145.text: Two: To protect the area of European freedom, external borders are necessary. No external borders means no Europe without internal borders.

663792909184028673.text: One: The West's liberal democracy is questioned & undermined. Our common task is to rebuild transatlantic trust & cooperation. #BC2015

663792110273994752.text: The fall of the Berlin Wall reminds us of three great challenges facing Europe. #Mauerfall #EuropaRede

663779212009070592.text: I am speaking in Berlin tonight at the 26th anniversary of the #Mauerfall. Watch live at 19h https://t.co/mKG0fhd0po. #BC2015 #EuropaRede

663762749944647681.text: Good phone call with @David_Cameron today preparing for upcoming negotiations on #UKinEU

663417811801370624.text: My schedule for the coming week: meeting #Merkel & a speech in Berlin, #VallettaSummit & informal #EUCO in Valletta https://t.co/beUwHYW6D2

661901242994663424.text: Speculations on trade-offs between Russia's actions in Syria & Ukraine to be rejected. Would not only be immoral but also ineffective

661900789884035072.text: Clear that Minsk agreements not yet fully implemented. This will need to be reflected in upcoming EU sanctions review

661900621734354944.text: #RefugeeCrisis also a global responsibility. I encourage all actors to step in and take a greater role, including at G20 Summit

661900270507528192.text: Right to political asylum is absolute; but no absolute right to choice of destination. We need to contain flow & make it orderly

661899626010820608.text: Only by working together in a spirit of solidarity & responsibility can Europe address #RefugeeCrisis

658984166583726080.text:
My remarks at the European Parliament today: https://t.co/fQ1KbeiJar. #EUCO #refugeecrisis #migrationEU #EPlenary
https://t.co/aTqD0hHCq2

658938332265713664.text: In two weeks I convene the #VallettaSummit to forge a real Euro-African partnership on migration

658937799333257216.text: We need more internal solidarity between Member States. Very first step to give Frontex, EASO all resources needed & relocate as agreed

658937443639545856.text: We need effective external border control to stop illegal border crossings, register asylum-seekers, organise reception facilities

658937190651703296.text: These are extraordinary times that require extraordinary measures, extraordinary sacrifices, extraordinary solidarity #migrationEU

658937005385101312.text: #RefugeeCrisis is perhaps biggest challenge for EU in decades. Has potential to create tectonic changes in the European political landscape

658934029887107072.text: RT @EUCouncilPress: Starting at 10.00, @eucopresident Tusk will speak at the #EPlenary on the October #EUCO. Watch live: https://t.co/GuYqL…

658320839495000064.text: My remarks ahead of the #WesternBalkansRoute meeting today: https://t.co/22J2UN2NP8. #refugeecrisis #migrationEU https://t.co/E9DDD8xMIY

658312433421983748.text: RT @EUCouncilTVNews: Leaders’ Meeting #Western Balkans route - @eucopresident on the protection of #EU external #borders  https://t.co/OQ6b…

657901407786418176.text: My remarks at the #VVDEuropadag today: https://t.co/whFZwEYM9e. #migrationEU https://t.co/sZoT7x7rVB

657884912532475908.text: Liberal centre can be tough & determined on external borders. Not to be more like right-wing populists, but to protect Europe against them.

657884829397229568.text: Re-establishment of the EU's external borders is our key task now. Not to make Europe inaccessible, but to effectively protect our values.

657884737764270081.text: We need to restore people's confidence in the liberal, moderate centre. Our duty is to provide security for our community, territory.

657884563759341568.text: Liberal minds built European civilisation based on ideas of freedom and tolerance. We must save their legacy from populism and radicalism.

657855390420480000.text: Ik kijk uit naar de samenwerking met @MinPres Rutte tijdens het Nederlandse Raadsvoorzitterschap. #EU2016NL https://t.co/ZI4U42l3fu

657855123910193152.text: Good to meet Dutch @MinPres Rutte today ahead of the upcoming Dutch Council presidency. #EU2016NL https://t.co/w2GNSp8K4r

657558253182820352.text: Discussed migration, Ukraine, energy, digital single market with old friend president @IlvesToomas of #Estonia today https://t.co/QSDi8bzZSq

657218672486912000.text: Read my speech at the EPP conference in Madrid: https://t.co/2IGXFMJSd2. #EPPMadrid #migrationEU #refugeecrisis https://t.co/7Qnl414nJV

657211121259147265.text: We cannot give in to populism & xenophobia. Our aim should be to strengthen Europe against right-wing extremists, not become like them.

657210920851124224.text: We must end completely unnecessary argument between protecting external borders & solidarity/openness. We need a rational hybrid of both.

657210662762991616.text: Today no task more important than re-establishing EU's external borders. Not to make EU an inaccessible fortress but to protect our values.

657210422953689088.text: Situation on EU borders critical. We can no longer allow solidarity to be equivalent to naivety, openness to helplessness, freedom to chaos.

657210027858599936.text: Speaking at the #EPPMadrid Congress today. Watch live here: https://t.co/k1oKNOKqji.

656490719910187008.text: Good to meet with President @BorutPahor of #Slovenia today, who briefed me on the situation on the ground. https://t.co/yTiKsagHZo

654793131053809665.text: On UK, I briefed leaders on preparatory discussions. We welcome @David_Cameron's commitment to set out UK's concerns in writing in November.

654793051001389057.text: Need humanitarian, efficient solutions to migration issues, otherwise others find solutions that are inhumane, nationalistic, not European.

654792986375536640.text: Member states will be ready to send hundreds more border guards to @FrontexEU and EASO to secure hotspots in Greece & Italy. #EUCO

654792896495771648.text: Frontex to be given right to return irregular migrants on its own initiative & become more proactive in protecting external borders. #EUCO

654792806653755393.text: EU-Turkey action plan is major step in right direction; only makes sense if it effectively contains flow of refugees. #EUCO

654784409304850432.text: Speaking to press after the European Council. Watch it live: http://t.co/jxxt3evuLn. #EUCO #refugeecrisis http://t.co/uRalrH4yGu

654707947918897152.text: I welcome PM @David_Cameron commitment to send me letter early November with a list of UK's demands. Then real negotiations can start

654621504865464320.text: RT @EUCouncilTVNews: Tripartite #Social Summit - Press Conference #Tusk @eucopresident  Stepping up #employment & #growth in #Europe http:/…

654611654869651456.text: Need to discuss challenges medium & long term: future of Dublin system, specific role of hotspots, possible EU border & coast guard system.

654611592496197632.text: Complex region to discuss. Talks with #Turkey ongoing. #Libya volatile. #Syria deteriorating: may lead to new massive exodus #refugees.

654611481061933056.text: National pledges to help @refugees through #UNHCR, @WFP, EU trust funds haven't been fulfilled. We can and must do much better here.

654611451953418240.text: Prepare #VallettaSummit: more for more principle, effective return & readmission, prevention illegal migration, legal migration channels

654611378926428160.text: EU should make full use of @FrontexEU now; make it a more operational body including the right to initiate & conduct returns.

654611315055554560.text: Today's #EUCO priorities: strengthen external borders, increase support to countries in neighbourhood & refugees there. #refugeecrisis

654611242104045568.text: Social partners have huge role to play in receiving & integrating #refugees coming to Europe. #refugeecrisis @BUSINESSEUROPE @etuc_ces

654611195970850816.text: Speaking to press after the #TripartiteSocialSummit. Follow it here: http://t.co/e6y4ajbJuT. #refugeecrisis #EMU http://t.co/cYWfIAVyXH

653993127812952064.text: Easy access to Europe is main pull factor for refugees. Need to discuss future of Dublin, hotspots & possible EU border guard system. #EUCO

653993055360536576.text: Difficult complex questions to discuss at #EUCO Thursday incl. question of safe zone in #Syria. Turkey wants it. Russia is openly against.

653992883750576129.text: An agreement with & concessions to Turkey only make sense if it effectively reduces influx of migrants. #EUCO #migrationEU

651310101622575104.text: My remarks at the EP today on #EUCO meetings on the #refugeecrisis: http://t.co/zIWA77V0WM. #EPlenary http://t.co/nVM1tuolRU

651302515225546752.text: Quite long queue of political machos to replace mainstream leaders if not able to guarantee security & order for their community

651302313575976960.text: In addition to solidarity, we need responsibility and common sense. Europe without external borders equals Europe without Schengen

651302149540941824.text: Restoration of control of external borders is precondition of effective, humanitarian, safe migratory policy

651302043026628608.text: A potential victory of Assad's regime, more likely today with support of Russia & Iran, will result in next migratory wave

651301873010520064.text: We have to count mainly on ourselves. Our neighbours have bigger problems. Some use refugees for dirty business or political bargaining chip

651301412979216384.text: All have to respect commonly agreed rules (Dublin, quotas). Observing rules will always mean sacrificing part of our interests

651301237510512640.text: Solidarity requires mutual understanding, respect. It is our common obligation to assist refugees & to protect EU's external borders

651301122246897664.text: Everyone's a critic - very few defend Europe's good name. But refugees come because our community is still most open & tolerant of all

651300758252593152.text: Today's #refugeecrisis is a dramatic stress test of our community. That's what the last European Council was about. #EPlenary #EUCO

648930496949395456.text: My full #UNGA speech http://t.co/65gCdu0Fzg. Global challenges to be dealt with multilaterally, or they will not be dealt with at all

648920184271544320.text: A global agreement on #ClimateChange must be reached. What matters is practical effects, not ideological fervour. #COP21 #Paris2015 #UNGA

648920114050564097.text: With pledge to reduce CO2 by 40% Europe leads #ClimateChange fight. We invite all to take part in common endeavour #COP21 #Paris2015 #UNGA

648919771266871296.text: Only goal & intention of #Syria peace plan must be to allow people to again start living normal lives in the region. #UNGA

648919551787298817.text: A fact that many refugees flee state terrorism. Stability cannot be won with barrel bombs & chemical weapons against civilians. #Syria #UNGA

648919377635594240.text: On a peace plan for #Syria: we should speak about the interests of millions of Syrians, not just of regional powers. #UNGA

648919095296008192.text: Many countries represented here do not allow migrants & refugees to enter at all. The #refugeecrisis demands global solidarity. #UNGA

648918433975939072.text: Eradicating poverty, supporting #peacekeeping, solving #migration crisis, tackling #ClimateChange: you can still count on us #UNGA

648918348365959169.text: Europe as committed to its values, objectives as ever despite confronting challenges unheard of for decades #UNGA

648918223874826240.text: Speaking right now at #UNGA on behalf of EU. Live on http://t.co/QV0cTWmdkq. #refugeecrisis #Syria #ClimateChange http://t.co/eV2z8iAgYi

648632854759505920.text: EU pledge to UN peacekeeping. 17 EU missions & financing of over 1/3 of UN peacekeeping #UNGA http://t.co/wpc6sjXMRn http://t.co/JMqG9cVfl6

646821960811474944.text: Proper management & control of our external borders is our common responsibility; unfair to put all the burden on Italy or Greece. #EUCO

646685142329724928.text: RT @EUCouncilTVNews: Informal #EUCO President #Tusk @eucopresident on #refugees We must end this cycle of mutual  misunderstandings http://…

646677054554025984.text: We need to strengthen our external border control including through @FrontexEU, #EASO and @EuropolEU. #refugeecrisis #migrationEU #EUCO

646676975751426048.text: Lebanon, Jordan, Turkey & other countries in the region need more help, as do the EU frontline countries. #refugeecrisis #migrationEU #EUCO

646676886316281857.text: I will also propose short-term measures. We should offer more help to @refugees in the region through @WFP & #UNHCR. #refugeecrisis #EUCO

646676715125800960.text: Most urgent question today is how we can manage our borders effectively; can't speak of a common European migration policy otherwise. #EUCO

646676447957004288.text: We are talking about millions of potential refugees trying to reach Europe, not thousands. #EUCO #refugeecrisis #migrationEU

646676364939104256.text: Conflicts in Syria & Iraq will not end soon. 8 mln people are displaced within Syria; 4 mln have fled to Turkey, Lebanon, Jordan, Iraq #EUCO

646676206994239488.text: Discussions among member states at critical point; we must end cycle of mutual recriminations & misunderstandings. #EUCO #migrationEU

644947666074513408.text: Our 'migration policy' the sum of despair of victims fleeing war & cynicism of smugglers & too often of tragic fate of refugees

644947497102741504.text: Protecting the European community our first duty & we have failed. Need to honestly discuss how we can help each other to manage crisis

644947399522287616.text: Refugee crisis a test of our humanity & responsibility. Blame game must stop. Need to rebuild unity & solidarity http://t.co/kUVfEtFWGq

642280465097953280.text: Without concrete sign of solidarity and unity from JHA ministers Monday, I will call extra #EUCO in September on refugee crisis

641975486495739904.text: Exodus to Europe is not the solution to refugee crisis or underlying problems. But Europe needs to step up short & long term actions

641975433983041536.text: Refugees in Nizip refugee camp & elsewhere are victims of war, failed states, poverty. We need to help them http://t.co/QixlHao2ax

641664886276276224.text: Also worried about yesterday's attacks against HDP HQ and Hurriyet. Trust & rule of law must prevail. No alternative to ceasefire

640993788865966080.text: My remarks at @Bruegel_org’s annual dinner: http://t.co/6qvkdMoP0f. #Bruegel10 #migrationEU #EMU

640960560075534336.text: Today's issues of #migration, #Greece crisis, #Ukraine war, terrorism & potential #Brexit require us to be loyal to one another & united.

640960087708823552.text: We need to reconcile border protection with solidarity towards refugees to the degree possible. Pragmatism is key. #Bruegel10 #migrationEU

640959761446510592.text: On #migration: cooperation with 3rd countries is crucial. This is why I will visit Turkey later this week. http://t.co/mSg0abmVeN #Bruegel10

640958561229631488.text: Legal advice is clear: we can introduce a common European deposit insurance scheme within the current EU treaties. #Bruegel10 #EMU

640958198552375296.text: Three key elements to improve the #EMU: European insurance scheme, capital markets union, euro area system of competitiveness authorities.

640957891126669312.text: Values are more important than ideologies. Need to focus on strengthening the EU in its current framework, step by step. #Bruegel10

640957509369507840.text: When Bruegel started in 2005, the EU was in a deep political crisis. Too much political day-dreaming, too far away from real life #Bruegel10

640956611385786368.text: I'm proud of Europe; happy I was born here. The EU is not the best of all possible worlds, but it is best of the existing ones. #Bruegel10

640953913370365952.text: Tonight I speak at @Bruegel_org's annual dinner on importance of pragmatism & moderation in EU politics. http://t.co/O4gApQPi72 #Bruegel10

640929781689790464.text: My agenda for this week incl. visits to Israel, Ramallah, Turkey and Cyprus: http://t.co/mSg0abmVeN. #Bruegel10

639391051552280576.text: Need to help build reception centres closer to conflict areas & increase assistance to 3rd countries like Turkey, Jordan, Lebanon, Morocco.

639390942361985025.text: Need to contain wave of #migration by strengthening borders & getting keys to our Europe back from the hands of smugglers & murderers.

639390662291521536.text: Fair distribution of at least 100.000 #refugees needed. Important gesture of real solidarity. #migrationEU

639390511049129984.text: Unforgivable if Europe split in two on #migration. Approaches of solidarity & containment not mutually exclusive. #migrationEU

639390420930330624.text: EU countries will not change migratory policies overnight but they need to show more #solidarity incl. countries not directly affected.

639339419019923456.text: #Paris2015 negotiations advance frustratingly slowly but clear that there's political will to reach ambitious global #climate agreement

639338966718750720.text: Speedy agreement of #TTIP important part of fight for openness, freedom and rule of law in the world

639338589227196417.text: We should accelerate parts of enlargement process related to immigration & asylum in Balkans; need to revitalise links with Turkey

639338409270595584.text: Key to many #migration challenges lies in relations w/ 3rd countries. Need stronger link between foreign policy, home affairs & development

639338232828829696.text: First goal to ensure people in need of international protection receive it. Second we must gain more control of mass population flows

639337871678304256.text: On #migration, I am working with leaders to build new consensus among governments on EU response

639337563824721920.text: #Ukraine is a test of Europe's fundamental values in its neighbourhood: future lies in rule of law instead of mix of muscle & corruption

639337361856458752.text: My foreign policy objectives: protecting EU values, making EU stronger internationally & strengthening transatlantic ties

539365731184701441.text: Fourth, relations between Europe & the United States are the backbone of the community of democracies. The year ahead will be crucial.

539365463093174274.text: Third, the EU must be strong internationally. Europe has to secure its borders, support those in neighbourhood who share our values.

539364968056229888.text: @eucopresident: Second, we need ruthless determination to end the economic crisis. It is our responsibility to complete the genuine #EMU.

539364537389318144.text: First, protecting our fundamental values, freedom and solidarity, against threats to the EU & its unity- both from inside & outside.

539364165480374272.text: I come here with a strong sense of purpose. In these difficult times Europe needs success. To me, this means four things. (1/5)

539363929395580928.text: I also thank @EUCouncil staff for the great job they have done supporting Herman Van Rompuy, and look forward to working with them.

539363663195684864.text: Van Rompuy helped steer Europe out of the storm. He personifies principles also important to me: trust, common sense, moderation, decency.

539363340318179328.text: On my first day as President of the European Council, I would like to thank my predecessor Herman Van Rompuy- a tough act to follow.

515200001753243648.text: Nous sommes réunis ici non pas pour déplorer l'impardonnable mais pour nourrir l'espoir, réaliser l'indispensable- agir ensemble. #UNGA69

515199506485620737.text: Défi climatique: l'Europe reste engagée en 1ere ligne et démontrera l'année prochaine dans les négociations de #Paris2015.

515198815595663360.text: On #Gaza: we need a two-state solution with an independent, democratic, viable Palestinian state, living in peace with Israel & neighbours.

515198678953639936.text: We need a political solution for #Syria. We owe it to the close to 200,000 victims, to the millions who have had to flee their homes.

515198338539720704.text: On #ISIL: we must block financial & weapon flows, cut off illegal oil revenue, stop influx of foreign fighters. EU countries work on this.

515197662422138881.text: With #Russia, our biggest neighbour, we are ready to engage and re-establish a basis of trust, of promises kept. #UNGA69

515197466908839936.text: An inclusive #Ukraine, with a new social contract and a fair balance between parts & whole, is the best way to secure the country's future.

515197147365801984.text: Europe responded to aggression & violation of international law with a wide range of sanctions- even if they could hurt our own economies.

515197094098137088.text: The EU continues to stand firmly in its solidarity with #Ukraine & its people in the face of the illegal annexation of #Crimea. #UNGA69

515196697279201280.text: When shared values are under pressure & the order of things seems to be unravelling, we must act. We can make the world a safer place again.

382918649159618560.text: L'échange de paroles qui engagent est un acte d'espoir. C'est précisément d'espoir dont on a besoin. Hope is in our hands. #UNGA

382918434511933440.text: J'en appelle donc à la conviction que le progrès en politique internationale passe par des paroles librement échangées entre parties. #UNGA

382918041761505280.text: The existential threat to the #euro area is over and we are now fully focusing on improving prospects for employment and growth. #UNGA

382917400582430720.text: l'Europe est prête à continuer a jouer son rôle dans le monde- nous ne nous désengageons pas de nos responsabilités dans le monde. #UNGA

382917157740634112.text: We Europeans are ready to help #Syria rebuild its nation. We have already provided 1,8 bln € and are by far its biggest aid provider. #UNGA

382916526875377664.text: We in Europe know that reconciliation between countries is the hardest thing- and it is even harder inside a country. #Syria #UNGA

382916324118523905.text: Ending a war is not easy. But the cost of hesitating, of not engaging, would be much higher- and not only for the people of #Syria. #UNGA

382916069905944576.text: We hope the expectations currently building around the new Iranian leadership will translate into concrete steps. #UNGA #Iran

382916013203148800.text: Palestine and Israel must be able to fulfil their legitimate aspirations: two states living side by side in peace and security. #MEPP #UNGA

382915788006772736.text: Now is the moment to work actively towards "Geneva II", to bring all parties to the negotiating table. #UNGA

382915500441088000.text: A clear UNSC resolution would mark a turn: in the black wall of #Syria's doom, it would be the first crack. #UNGA

382914988593389569.text: Five weeks ago, in the outskirts of Damascus, a new threshold of tragedy, a crime against humanity occurred. #Syria #UNGA

382914924298928128.text: Further paralysis of the international community over #Syria is simply untenable. #UNGA

382914851863298049.text: We cannot let the spiral of criminal, sectarian violence pursue its dreadful course in #Syria. #UNGA
